column1: == In cooking ==
Marsala wine is frequently used in cooking
column2: and is especially prevalent in dishes served in Italian restaurants in the United States.

column1: Dry Marsala wine is used in savory cooking.  A typical savory Marsala sauce
column3: involves reducing the wine almost to a syrup with onions or shallots
column4: then adding mushrooms and herbs. One of the most popular Marsala recipes is chicken marsala
column5: in which flour-coated pounded chicken breast halves are braised in a mixture of Marsala
column9: and spices.  Marsala is also used in some risotto recipes.
